Package model

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer in the simulation. Each customer has an arrival time, removal time, and a unique ID. Customers can visit various service points and have their actions recorded.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Customer()
    Constructs a new Customer with a unique ID.
